data.title: SiriusXM FC
data.meta_description: SiriusXM FC is dedicated entirely to soccer, featuring live play-by-play and talk shows hosted by legends of the game.
data.text:

An English breakfast with a side of pancakes, a double espresso, and a pinch of soccer! It's SiriusXM FC's flagship morning show starring Ray Hudson, Tom Rennie, and Charlie Stillitano.
